verses.verse: And I saw <WG3708> another <WG243> sign <WG4592> in heaven, <WG3772> great <WG3173> and marvelous, <WG2298> seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> who had <WG2192> seven <WG2033> plagues, <WG4127> [which are] the last, <WG2078> because <WG3754> in them the wrath <WG2372> of God <WG2316> is finished. <WG5055>

And I saw, <WG3708> as it were, a sea <WG2281> of glass <WG5193> mixed <WG3396> with fire, <WG4442> and those <WG3588> who had come <WG3528> off <WG3528> victorious <WG3528> from the beast <WG2342> and from his image <WG1504> and from the number <WG706> of his name, <WG3686> standing <WG2476> on the sea <WG2281> of glass, <WG5193> holding <WG2192> harps <WG2788> of God. <WG2316>

And they sang <WG103> the song <WG5603> of Moses <WG3475> the bond-servant of God <WG2316> and the song <WG5603> of the Lamb, <WG721> saying, <WG3004> "Great <WG3173> and marvelous <WG2298> are Thy works, <WG2041> O Lord <WG2962> God, <WG2316> the Almighty; <WG3841> Righteous <WG1342> and true <WG228> are Thy ways, <WG3598> Thou King <WG935> of the nations. <WG1484>

"Who <WG5101> will not fear, <WG5399> O Lord, <WG2962> and glorify <WG1392> Thy name <WG3686>? For Thou alone <WG3441> art holy; <WG3741> For all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> will come <WG2240> and worship <WG4352> before <WG1799> Thee, For Thy righteous <WG1345> acts <WG1345> have been revealed. <WG5319>"
After <WG3326> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> I looked, <WG3708> and the temple <WG3485> of the tabernacle <WG4633> of testimony <WG3142> in heaven <WG3772> was opened, <WG455>

and the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> who had <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> plagues <WG4127> came <WG1831> out of the temple, <WG3485> clothed <WG1746> in linen, <WG3043> clean <WG2513> [and] bright, <WG2986> and girded <WG4024> around <WG4012> their breasts <WG4738> with golden <WG5552> girdles. <WG2223>

And one <WG1520> of the four <WG5064> living <WG2226> creatures <WG2226> gave <WG1325> to the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> bowls <WG5357> full <WG1073> of the wrath <WG2372> of God, <WG2316> who lives <WG2198> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165>

And the temple <WG3485> was filled <WG1072> with smoke <WG2586> from the glory <WG1391> of God <WG2316> and from His power; <WG1411> and no <WG3762> one <WG3762> was able <WG1410> to enter <WG1525> the temple <WG3485> until <WG891> the seven <WG2033> plagues <WG4127> of the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> were finished. <WG5055>
